answers.answer: HI CJ soooooooooo happy no diabetes, sooooooooooo happy things are looking up for you!! Have a great dayDenise
thanks for the post, have a great day too :)CJ

question: Just to let you all know had diabetes tests over two weeks, and good news no Diabetes, so cream doughnuts back on the menu :) and doc was really good this morning about numb bits of me,she is much more friendly towards me and is taking things seriously,even to the point of writing to my workplace so i dont lose job. hope you all having good dayblessings on you allCJ
title: Diabetes tests good news
